title: Public server not working fine. Local server doesn't serve index.html
body:
Hello again! I'm coming from here: https://github.com/schollz/find/issues/189

I've followed the instructions in the README.md but I get this as response:

> Request URL:http://www.maraudersmap.online/?group=BULKYBULL&lat=-32.95980&lon=-60.63450
> Request Method:GET
> Status Code:302 Found
> Remote Address:162.255.119.250:80
> Referrer Policy:no-referrer-when-downgrade

I've renamed the area "kitchen" to:

> kitchen=32.95980=-60.63450=0

I've tried to run the server locally and I get this:

>  * Running on http://0.0.0.0:5000/ (Press CTRL+C to quit)

When I go to localhost:5000 on browser I get:

> Not Found
> 
> The requested URL was not found on the server. If you entered the URL manually please check your spelling and try again.

I've also tried http://localhost:5000/index.html but I get a 404.

This seems great. I hope I can get it running. Thank you again!

PD: How can I use a custom map/tile/floor
